data.classification: Naive Bayes. It is used in AI, Machine Learning,
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Implements a useful and popular algorithm for automatic
    classification: Naive Bayes. It is used in AI, Machine Learning,
    Data Mining, etc.

    A similar module Algorithms::NaiveBayes is tuned for text
    categorization and it is not the generic algorithm; e.g., it
    includes smoothing.
